name: Warden's Will
storyline: An interdimensional Evil AI is destroying the multiverse. Countless others tried to stop it but failed. As a last resort, Wardens program is initiated and now you and your friends have to stop the AI from destroying the multiverse and discover what happened to your creators while destroying evil robots
summary: Warden's Will is a co-op hero shooter with roguelite progression, bullet hell combat, and a puzzle-driven story. Move and fight like superheroes, dominate the battlefield, and stop the Evil AI from destroying the Multiverse. Solo or with up to 3 friends!
